Duluth.Lake Superior College:
Lake Superior College (LSC) is a two-year community and technical college in Duluth, Minnesota.
The college offers pre-baccalaureate majors for students interested in transferring to 4-year educational institutions as well as more than 90 certificate, diploma and degree programs in career and technical fields. LSC's Continuing Education/Customized Training division collaborates with area businesses and industry to design specialized opportunities for entry-level and advanced education.
